About Two-Ms Malt N Burger Mart Two-Ms Malt N Burger Mart is a Fast Food restaurant located at 2014 Avenue H in Rosenberg, TX . Two-Ms Malt N Burger Mart has been described as an Amazing Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 8.4 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, American, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for Two-Ms Malt N Burger Mart
All Reviews for Two-Ms Malt N Burger Mart
C
January 20, 2009
Food
8
Decor
3
Service
8
In 2009 you still see the same guy take your order that took it in 1963. Order a burger and I bet you he responds "lettuce, tomato, pickle, onion, mustard?". How many times do you think he's done that? A million? Burgers are best when he is there of course as the night shift seems to be in another world. Open Monday - Saturday from 9:30 am - 9 pm. Malts&shakes are great&cheap. Fries&onion rings are standard frozen to fryer variety (don't hold that against them though cause the place is really small to produce more). Worth the trip.
I Ate:
Super Cheeseburger Combo: terrific ($6)
Overall Rating
6.8
"Exceptional"
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
10
Decor
10
Service
10
Great burger place. The food is way above average for a burger place. The only problem I see is the seating and parking is VERY limited. A few times we have tried to go there, either there is no parking or all the tables have been taken. Worth the risk though.
Overall Rating
10
"Perfect"
